title: LIOC agrees to provide 6,000MT Diesel to CEB
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) says that the Lanka IOC agreed to provide 6,000 MT of Diesel required for electricity generation.
Thilak Premakantha appointed new Director General of National Zoological Gardens
Handing over lands to investors do not mean Govt is selling national assets: MP Jagath Kumara
